DOC.brief_summary: About 9 24 % woman undergo vitro fertilization ( IVF ) treatment respond poorly usual gonadotrophin stimulation protocol apply . Several induction ovulation treatment suggest increase pregnancy rate . In study , investigator compare outcome Microflare protocol Flare regimen poor responder .
DOC.brief_title: Outcome Two Protocols Poor Responders Assisted Reproductive Technology ( ART ) Cycle
DOC.detailed_description: In randomized clinical trial study , total 200 infertile woman poor ovarian response undergo IVF / ICSI treatment cycle Royan Institute enroll study randomly divide two group 100 patient . This study approve Royan ethic committee write consent obtain patient . The patient randomize one two group Flare Up Microdose GnRh agonist flare . Luteinizing Hormone ( LH ) , Follicle Stimulating Hormone ( FSH ) , Estradiol , evaluate day 2 3 follicle size become > 14 . 2 week embryo transfer , patient test serum β-hCG assessing pregnancy . The clinical pregnancy clarify number woman gestational sacs transvaginal sonography 4-6 week gestation . In calculation implantation , number gestational sac consider .
DOC.criteria: Poor responder ( Presence least two follow item necessary inclusion study ) History Cycle Cancellation History oocyte number 3 ( previous cycle ) History Number antral follicle < 5 previous cycle Age≥38 FSH > 12 day 2 3 Ovarian Volume 3 cm3 Male factor ( azospermi ) Myoma ≥6cm One way ovary Tumor cyst > 13mm Age > 42
